To Whom It May Concern: 

 

It is with great interest and enthusiasm that I am applying for a position as a Budtender. 


I have acquired excellent customer service and sales skills over the duration of my employment history. I trust and believe the skills and professionalism I have learned will be of particular interest to you. 

I have always been interested in the Medical Marijuana Industry and in patient/customer care. I hope that you can use someone with my particular background, skills, and abilities. Please communicate with me to setup an interview. 


Thank you for your time and consideration.  

 

Sincerely, 


Dallas Richie III
